title: Senor Zorbas
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. American-run Mexican restaurant with wide variety of vegetarian dishes including veggie fajitas, taco salad, bean burritos, chimichangas, mexi pizza, chips and salsa. Can substitute any dairy for salsa, avocado, guacamole, etc.
streetAddress: On Road to Main Port, Fira
